div.p: SAGINA, in botany: A genus of the tetragynia order, belonging to the tetrandria claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking under the 22d order, Caryioρbyllei. The calyx is tetraphyllous; the petals four; the capſule is unilocular, quadrivalved, and polyſpermous.
